title: Better than Cracker Barrel Chicken 'n Dumplings

Ingredients.7: 2  carrots, sliced, or more to taste

Ingredients.9: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Place chicken and 1 pinch salt in a large pot; cover with water. Bring to a boil, skimming any scum off the surface with a slotted spoon. Add lemon, celery, onion, and carrots. Simmer broth over medium heat until chicken starts to fall off the bone, about 1 hour.

Directions.2: Discard lemon. Remove chicken from the pot; let cool.

Directions.3: Place flour, salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Make a well in the center. Ladle in 2 to 3 scoops of hot broth. Mix in flour with a spoon until dough comes together into a ball.

Directions.4: Turn dough out onto a floured surface. Knead carefully until smooth. Roll out into a large rectangle; cut into small rectangular dumplings.

Directions.5: Drop dumplings one at a time into the simmering broth. Cook, stirring occasionally, until tender, about 30 minutes.

Directions.6: Bone chicken and chop into pieces. Add to the pot; cook until heated through, about 5 minutes.
